title: Erik Larson: "The Splendid and the Vile"
description: Michael's conversation with best-selling author Eric Larson, author of "The Splendid and the Vile: A Saga of Churchill, Family, and Defiance During the Blitz." Original air date 9 July 2020. The book was published on 25 February 2020.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Erik Larson)
